title: Teachers' Identity Conflicts and Their Impact on Student Learning: Understanding Through Narrative Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational education theory and understanding of adult learning principles
context.additional_context: Advanced course for corporate trainers exploring how teacher identity formation impacts learning through real-case analysis.

learning_goals: Teachers' cases of multiple identity conflicts can be analyzed using qualitative research methods.
Narrative analysis techniques can be applied to interpret the context of teacher-student interactions.
A framework can be designed to evaluate the impact of teacher identity transformation on student learning outcomes.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
